metadata.title: CVE-2021-20216 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in Privoxy in versions before 3.0.31. A memory leak that occurs when decompression fails unexpectedly may lead to a denial of service. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.33-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.33-1').
